title: How does one beat LeBlanc in laning phase in blind pick?
body: Do I just leave lane and be a semi jungler for the first 20 mins because LeBlanc won't reach the tower until then?

replies.body:
LeBlanc only has decent waveclear if she maxes W, which reduces her ability to explode you with Sigil of Malice. As others have said, waveclear is generally helpful.

Long duration silences and being hard to kill helps, too. {{champion:31}}  and {{champion:90}} match up pretty well against her, assuming you can avoid ganks. Both of them can push the wave, usually build Rod of Ages for tankiness, and have silences if she goes in on you.
The question specifically says blind pick... But it's still nice to know
Push to her tower. She cant farm under tower very well and cant harass/all-in you if she already had to use cds to farm. Just be careful of ganks
good wave clear fucks her hard

Her distortion speed has recently been heavily nerfed. It's actually much easier to lane against her now. 
You can dodge distortion by walking towards her. 
She's squishy and quick to kill if caught with a stun or silence, think fiddlesticks and Ekko. 
Her Q lets her do a lot of damage, if you can dodge her other abilities you should take a lot of damage. 
Go read her abilities so you know what she does.
